attributes.name: Adult Advanced - Tuesday 6:15pm
attributes.description:
PLEASE DO NOT ENROLL IN A CLASS NOT APPROPRIATE TO YOUR LEVEL!

The adult curriculum is designed for beginning, intermediate and experienced adult skaters who wish to improve their skating skills. Participation in the program will help promote physical fitness and improve balance and coordination while teaching proper skating techniques. Group instruction includes a 30 minute class and 30 minute supervised practice,

Intermediate 3 (Freestyle 1 equivalent) & Adult Intro to Advanced

1. Backward outside edges

2. Backward inside edges

3. Two-foot spin

4. Forward spiral

5. Forward inside pivot

6. Waltz jump

 

Tuesday Adult Advanced

Taught by experienced coaches to cater to the desire of the class, The Tuesday Adult Advanced class goes beyong the fundamental skills of adult beginner and intermediate to learn advanced turns, changes of edge, spins, jumps, and sometimes choreographed step sequences.

*Please note, this is a 1 hour class split onto both sheets of ice. 6:15-6:45pm Class on OLYMPIC rink, 6:45-7:15pm Practice on NHL rink*
